title: No longer see Whatsapp folder in Internal Shared Storage.
content:
Hi, Since the latest security update, the Whatsapp folder that I used to see when I connected to my PC and clicked on Internal Shared Torage has gone.

I have found it but I now have to click on: Internal Shared Storage > Android >  media > com.whatsapp. Whew! Any good reason for this?

Stay safe.
